description: Cambridge keep their slim League One survival hopes alive with a 1-0 win over foot-of-the-table Shrewsbury.
title: Shrewsbury Town 0-1 Cambridge United
title_page: Shrewsbury Town 0-1 Cambridge United - BBC Sport
maintext:
Shrewsbury Town have lost each of their last two league games against Cambridge United, as many defeats as across their prior nine meetings combined (W2 D5).
After winning the reverse fixture 4-1 in December last year, Cambridge United will be looking to complete a first Football League double over Shrewsbury Town since the 1990-91 season.
Shrewsbury have lost four of their last five home league games (D1), failing to score in each of their last four. The Shrews last failed to score in more home matches in a row between December 2018 and January 2014 (five games).
